bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Charlotte County was formed in 1764 from Lunenburg County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Petition, 1868, of Charlotte County related to a criminal matter. The persons who signed the petition stated that an individual arrested for arson was innocent.
